title: When is your Internal Review Notice (IRN) dated?
dateLegend: Enter the date from the top right of your IRN letter

error.dayRequired: You have not entered a valid day. Enter a day.
error.monthRequired: You have not entered a valid month. Enter a month.
error.yearRequired: You have not entered a valid year. Enter a year.
error.invalid: You’ve entered an invalid IRN date. Enter the IRN date.
error.future: You’ve entered a date in the future. Enter the IRN date.
error.dateSameAsImage: You have entered the date from the picture. Look at your own IRN and enter the date shown.
